note.p: Scottish. Daughter of John McElroy (1802/3–76), housing developer and proprietor of houses, and his wife, Janet McKinlay Kidd. Of Craigrownie, Cove, Dunbartonshire, 1861; Clydehaugh House, Govan, Glasgow, 1881.
Census returns of Scotland 1861 (The National Archives of Scotland: Rosneath 3/12), 1881 (Govan Church 20/1)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 November 2020)
Rosneath Peninsula Heritage Trail: west coast (thelochsidepress.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/rosneath-peninsula-west-coast-heritage-trail-leaflet-1.pdf, accessed 7 May 2021)
Scotland, births and baptisms, 1564–1950 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 November 2020)
